Straightforward manipulations ▪ PRO: Simple, easy ▪ PRO: Very common ▪ CON: Can be too artificial ▪ CON: Demand characteristics Staged manipulations ▪ PRO: Better simulation ▪ PRO: Can avoid demand characteristics ▪ CON: May arouse suspicious ▪ CON: Can be difficult to proceed as planned 8 How to tell if manipulation worked? ▪ Manipulation check: a method by which researchers can quantify the effectiveness of a manipulation Seen as more violent?
